      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(int button,
                int x,
                int y)
        Description copied from interface: TIGUIInterface
        Used to update upon a mouse button being pressed down.
        Is usually called before mouseReleased(int button, int x, int y).
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface TIGUIInterface
        Overrides:
        mousePressed in class TGUIComponent
        Parameters:
        button - - The button ID that is being pressed. 0 - LMB, 1 - RMB, 2 - MMB
        x - - The x co-ordinate that the button was pressed on.
        y - - The y co-ordinate that the button was pressed on.
        See Also:
        TIGUIInterface.mouseReleased(int, int, int)
